css-loader: ability to load css from files
mini-css-extract-plugin: extract files from .vue and .sass to a separate file
html-webpack-plugin: generate index.html with file hashes
node-sass: compiles sass into css
sass-loader: loads sass from files to node-sass
ts-loader: loads typescript from files to typescript
typescript: compiles ts into es5
tslint: adds tslint to webstorm
vue-class-component: allows to write component as classes
vue-loader: allows to assemble vue via webpack
vue-template-compiler: allows to write singlefile component
vue-property-decorator: allows to specifies ts types on props and etc
vuex-class: allows to write  `@State foo` instead of @Component({ computed: mapState(['stateName']) and abilitity to have type
webpack: assembles multiple files into a single one, resolving required dependencies
webpack-dev-server: serves files from node server
webpack-cli: required by webpack to run builds
file-loader: allows to copy files specifies as urls in css to output directory
url-loader: allows to copy files speicified as urls into base64 data
chai + @types/chai: assertions
ts-node: ability to run ts-code without transpiling it to files on fs first
mocha: test library
